title: En Uyirin Uyiraga Lyrics Bramman Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: En Uyirin Uyiraga
Singer(s): Anitha, Devi Sri Prasad
Music: Devi Sri Prasad
Movie: Bramman 

En Uyirin Uyiraga
en vizhiyin oliyaaga
en manadhin isaiyaaga
varuvaaya varuvaaya?

en iravin kanavaaga
en nadhiyin karaiyaaga
en vazhiyin thunnaiaaga
varuvaaya varuvaayaa ?

Mazhai peidhaal enna
veyil kaaindhaal enna.
kadal neelam mattum
endrum saayam pogaadhey.

Unnai  ennum neram
idhayathin oram
adi eeramillaa saaral
ondru veesudhey.

En Uyirin Uyiraga
en vizhiyin oliyaaga
en manadhin isaiyaaga
varuvaaya varuvaaya?

en iravin kanavaaga
en nadhiyin karaiyaaga
en vazhiyin thunnaiaaga
varuvaaya varuvaayaa ?

Oh panjile thaavum theeyum
nenjile vazhum anbum.
Oyumaa? adi oyumaa?
adhu melum melum koodum.

Kadhalai kannil kanda
kadavulai neril paarthaal.
Pottrava illai thoottravaa?
naan kulambi pogireney.

Mayil thogai sumandhaalum
mara vandu polethaan.
manadhoram unai aetri
medu pallam paaraamal sendren.

En Uyirin Uyiraga
en vizhiyin oliyaaga
en manadhin isaiyaaga
varuvaaya varuvaaya?

Paarayin naduve kinaraa?
nadhigalin naduve padagaa ?
niyabagam un niyabagam 
ennai thaangi kondu pogum.

Unnidam illaa tharunam
swasikkum nodiyum maranam
aayulin neelamey
un anaippin neelamey.

Pani peyyum neeraale
malai ondrum karaiyaadhu
tholai dhooram ponaalum
unnai thaedi ododi varuven. 

En Uyirin Uyiraga
en vizhiyin oliyaaga
en manadhin isaiyaaga
varuvaaya varuvaaya?

en iravin kanavaaga
...
